attributes.action: abolish the law for procecutions the motorists  using radar detectors which assist in road safety, but to ban the use of radar jammers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give the motorists the right to retain radar dectector devices to give the motorist some basic human rights we seem to give all terrorists, but  banning the use of all radar jamming devises
